name: HTML Wall Rider
description:
My first HTML game using the THREE.JS framework 

Simple Infinite runner 

Dodge the incoming triangles and collect the yellow balls to gain extra points

Survive the longest time possible to get a higher score

Move left and right on all three walls to dodge and collect the points 

Increasing difficulty

Controls:

 A-Move left on plane 

D- Move right on plane 

 Q- Switch wall left 

E-Switch wall right
